reviews.review:
It lacks the Puzzly Maze like feel of the original, going for scope and scale instead with mixed results. Whilst the new enviroments are nice to look at, the Vehicle sections feel like too much of ' Lets see how big and far we can make it' and at times you feel genuinely carsick playing especially in the Waterboat chapter.

The opening Is so goddamn epic, you are in a huge city, awakened after 20 years in stasis, it feels like a huge movie or something. This is probably one of the first games that really gave you that epic cinematic storytelling feel you are used to these days. I feel it never really gets going, like for all the scale and grandeur the opening chapter promises, It never quite comes full circle, most of the weapons feel useless and the Gravity gun is a really fantastic idea and feature, but it is never utilised in a puzzle manner , just grab stuff and fling it at enemies.

However whilst I feel it is overhyped, and preferred the original, this is a worthy sequel, you get invested in the characters and story and feel really immersed. I don't think there was anything else like this at the time, not even Halo. Really was the pinnacle of its era.

Don't forget it's follow ups expansions " Stare at alyx's Ass and its sequel Stare some more at alyx's ass"

 8.5/10
I think this game should be known by everyone. Really, it's that good

Great! is how I describe this game.  A fun sci-fi game that works well on either Mac or PC platforms.  This game is old enough to be a classic now and the driving standard for many modern game graphics.  If you have not played HL2 yet and are a first person RPG fan, you've done messed up son!  With awesome weapons, story and characters I crave the forever promised HL3!  And you will too after a run through of HL2.  Seriously, way more fun than many, many other RPG titles.  

I <3 HL2

(I've played some HL2 in the past on the original Xbox, and the "Orange Box" copy as well. My playtime on the steam version is only on the "Normal-Easy" setting. I am planning to play on the hardest difficulty soon)

This game is phenominal.
Back when the FPS genre was something to look forward to, the Half-Life series was no exception.
In this installment of Half-Life, you are the almighty slayer/scientist Gordon Freeman, summoned again to defeat any opposition in your way, trying to take back Earth from the Combine.

The game itself has a rich story and wonderful lore. Half-Life 2 explaines everything to you without having to play the first one. In fact, in my opinion, Half-Life 2 handled storytelling much better than the first installment.
Every character has a personallity, from Alyx, Eli, Barney, Dr. Kliner, Etc. Even some of the "Single Serving NPS's" have a bit of personality. Like Father Grigori. Even NPS's that don't say much are well known, like the "Counsoling Couple". The dialogue is also a plus, my favorite line is from Barney, we all know what it is! "And if you see Dr. Breen, tell him I said, 'F*CK YOU'"! (Srry Barney "oweing beer" fans, if any out there lol)

The gun/game play is also top notch. The game itself has a world that you can interact with where other games don't let you. This promotes thought-provoking "puzzles" and makes the Gravity Gun one of the best weapons in Gaming Hsitory. Seriously, two whole levels promotes the Gravity Gun alone. The games design encourages felxable ways to dispatch your foes, and that makes the game much more interesting! Personally, I've played a run with only using the shotgun. (Except in RPG/GG Portions) 

Graohics are good for the year 2004, and even today I still promote the graphics.
The game length will take you about 10-12 hours if you play on normal. However, this game will sucker you back in for sure. I did, that's why I got the "Orange Box" and steam edition. I NEEDED to play the game again. 

Practically any PC can run this game, I've played this on a hoopty laptop from 2008 and it ran the game like a YouTube Video.

Overall, Half Life 2 is a great game that you should play at least one time. It's a fun and amazing experience. 
Truly one of the best.
sehr gutes game!

Do you like games? Do you like amazing atmosphere, a good story, and a creepy undertone on your games? Well, here we are. I'm 6 years late to the party, but Half Life 2 is one of my favorite games ever. I have stated some of the reasons above for why I think this, but the game is all those things crafted together into one very fun package that combines fast-paced action and clever puzzles to create an awesome beacon of awesomeness. If you're thinking about buying the DLC's, Episode 1 sort of sucked and was not very important story wise, but did have a couple cool moments. Episode 2 is on par with or maybe even better than Half Life 2, and is important to story and provides much more fun gameplay compared to Episode 1. What makes this game even better is the plethora of mods, including the awesome Black Mesa source (being made into a steam game at the moment), Precursor, and many others. 

Buy It.

They are waiting for you, Gordon.

Que se puede decir que no se alla dicho, Half-Life 2, la secuela del popular juego de Valve presenta grandes innovaciones para su época, con el motor Source. Buenas gráficas y una jugabilidad excelente, que recuerda MUCHO a la de su predecesor, puede ser tanto divertido como frustrante. 
Tengo que decir, que gran parte del juego son pruebas para demostrar la potencia y posibilidades del motor, como lanzar objetos, moverlos, interactuar con el mapa, lo que no es malo, pero puede sentirce, en algunos casos, molesto. 
Otro inconveniente es que en numerosas situaciones el juego puede resultar confuso, por los numerosos puzles que hay, y porque a veces no queda claro hacia donde ir.
Recomiendo este juego junto con el Orange Box, ya que, además de mas barato (y de traer un gorro para el TF2), incluye los episodios, ya que, siendo honesto, la historia es MUY confusa, especialmente sin haber jugados los episodios.
No es del todo necesario haber jugado el juego anterior, pero no viene nada mal, además de probar las expansiones de Blue Shift y Decay que pueden cooperar con el entendimiento de la historia.

Por el amor de dios, si no lo jugaron, intenten, es su deber como PC gamers (no se lo tomen tan literal). Y si lo hacen, procuren dejar las voces en ingles subtitulado, ya sabrán porque.

Half-Life 2 to gra gatunku Action/FPS stworzona 16 listopada 2004 roku przez firmę Valve.Akcja gry toczy się w City 17 rządonym przez Wallace Breen.

 W sequelu popularnej gry z 1998 roku (Half-Life) przede wszystkim zmieniła się grafika.Gra naprawdę cieszy,a jest zrobiona na silniku Source ! W dwójce dodano też trochę więcej fabuły,lepszą fizykę i mechanikę gry,a także dwa dodatki.Gra zadowala też pięknie zrobionymi lokacjami z dobrze użytym modelem zniszczeń.Jedynym minusem jest długość gry,otóż gra pozwala na ok.15 godzin zabawy.Warto wpomnieć też o postaciach i ich sztucznej inteligencji,oraz o mimice twarzy,otóż postacie mrugają,usta ruszają się zgodnie z dźwiękiem i tak dalej,to wszystko robi to,że postacie są jak żywe.Wielkie brawa też dla dźwięku-to on uczynia lokacje jeszcze bardziej żywymi.Half-Life'a polecam też ze względów wymagań sprzętowych,takie dzieło może działać nawet na starszych komputerach.Warto wspomnieć też o broniach dobrze wymyślonych,których jest wystarczająco dużo.Tak jak "jedynka" to klasyk,a wciąż kultowy.Dzieło Valve nie jest monotonne,a dubbing jest po prostu wpsaniały.

 Posumówując za ok.40zł dostajemy kawał naprawdę dobrej roboty,grę polecam każdemu fanowi gier.Gra dostała 9 nagród,z czego 6 to tytuł za najlepszą grę,a reszta (3) nagrody są przyznane za grafikę.

                                     SPIS NAGRÓD :

Anyway, recommended to Valve fans who want to experience the history.

Czasem 30 minut (!) się głowiłem nad jedną (!) zagadką, których tutaj co nie miara. Jak ktoś kupił Orange Box'a albo zamierza to polecam przejść wszystko po kolei (wtedy fabuła układa się w całość)

What can I say? It's Half Life 2. I see so many echoes from this game in other games that I've played. The pacing is perfect, the story riveting and mysterious, the characters believable and loveable, the darkness is scary. Just when you think it's easy, you fight a gunship or a strider and you die like it's going out of style. Fun. I can't say this enough, as so many developers make games that are pretty but just not fun... this game is a blast. 

I recognize the age of this game, but I feel like the enemies' movements were incredibly easy to predict, they did basically nothing to get out of the way once you started shooting at them. Otherwise I have basically nothing to complain about in this game. 10/10 can't wait to replay it.

Dude. It's Half-Life. Why are you even reading the reviews?

[b] Pros: [/b]
- A wide variety of environments that are all memorable to explore
- Wonderful pacing
- Fun combat
- Top-notch story
- Amazing soundtrack
- Despite being a 2004 game, HL2 has aged better than any other Valve title

[b] Cons: [/b]
- The story segments can be a bit sluggish on multiple playthroughs, harming replayabity
- Despite how fun combat is, the gunplay is really mediocre, and a reduced weapon count from the first game hurts it more

[b] Overall: 9.2/10 [/b]
Half-Life 2 is a game absolutely everyone should experience. It's cheap, and yet, is one of the best games to experience, ever. While I consider the first game to be better, HL2 is still an absolute essential to anyone who plays video games.

Предвижу, что меня сейчас закидают овощами и тухлыми яйцами, но всё же скажу. Если Вы раньше в неё не играли, то я НЕ рекомендую начинать!
Да, я знаю, что [b] [i] это почитаемый многими шедевр и ностальгический идол. Эта игра много сделала для развития игровой индустрии, и у неё всё ещё (спустя 10 лет!) сравнительно приличная графика и физика. В этом плане 5+! Тут я с вами, ребята! Если Вы про то, чтобы поощрить разрабов, то я тоже не против! Я не жадный человек, и у меня есть чувство благодарности. [/i] [/b]
Да, игра и правда хороша, особенно на фоне того мусора, который частенько выходит в этом жанре. У неё прекрасный движок, и она представляет собой нечто большее, чем просто шутер.
Но если меня спросят, советую ли я купить её сегодня, чтобы получить удовольствие, мой ответ - нет. Почему? 
Потому что кроме движка и игровой механики существует ещё сюжет, разнообразие игрового процесса и общая логика, связывающая воедино сюжет и игровой процесс. Здесь игра подотстала, и я считаю, что это хорошо, значит игровая индустрия развивается дальше, а не сидит на попе ровно в ожидании третьей Халфы, чтобы тупо её скопировать.


Вот четыре самых очевидных минуса:
 * Во-первых, наш герой постоянно молчит. На все, что ему говорят, он отвечает гробовым молчанием. Он не здоровается, не благодарит и даже не ругается. Всё, что нам нужно знать  и делать, скажут игровые персонажи. Так что делайте, что Вам говорят.
 * Во-вторых, гвоздодер. Такое впечатление, что докторскую степень наш протагонист получил в каком-то институте физической культуры на факультете по гвоздодёрному бою. Вообще не совсем понятно, почему именно наш протагонист (учёный) спасает мир, ведь для этого нужно всего три вещи: иногда стрелять, постоянно бить всех гвоздодёром и изредка дергать рычаги.
 * В-третьих, мы идём по тропинке. В прямом смысле. Вы будете делать так, как за Вас решили. Или умрёте.
 * В-четвёртых, сюжет. Зубы сводит от всех этих научных катастроф, которые ставят Землю на грань вымирания. И не важно, кто там виноват - зомби, ожившие машины, гоблины, демоны или пришельцы. Почему? Потому что у нас есть гвоздодёр, который разом их всех уфигачит. Потому что против лома нет приёма, и выбора, кроме как спасти этот мир, у нас нет!
Но есть выбор - покупать ли данную игру?
Magnifique jeu !

Советую всем в нее поиграть!

This game came out in 2004 and people are still modding this game. The gunplay is a little clunky by modern taste, but the overall gameplay can't be matched. Even though it is a linear shooter, the levels are really long and have massive sandboxes that will have you wanting to search every abandoned house and every building or cave. The story is a little unclear at first, but in the end it's the environment that tells the story, a story of the apocalypse and humanities sufferace under a tyrannical government run by aliens. Unlike call of duties setpiece vehical moments, you actually get entire levels where you are either speeding down a narrow canal in a makeshift gunboat with combine on your tail, or driving down an abandoned highway with multiple signes of humanities deimise all around you. To this day, the only linear shooter that could ever come close to the depth and immersiveness in this game is Half-Life 3 (you hear that, Valve).

Музыка в этой игре просто божественная и на 90% подобрана к месту.
Персонажи необычные, запоминаються очень хорошо.
Единственное что могу сказать так это AI, некторые боты туповаты.
Оценка игры 10/10

Ah ce bon vieux Half-Life 2 ! Que de souvenirs !
Toujours aussi agréable à jouer, nerveux, varié, et en y rejouant, j'ai retrouvé une sensation longtemps oubliée dans les FPS d'aujourd'hui : on voyage beaucoup ! La variété des décors, des moyens de locomotion, ça fait plaisir de rejouer à un FPS où l'on a pas l'impression de rester constamment dans la même zone.
C'est long, c'est assez agréable à l'oeil malgré l'âge (au moins ça a le mérite de pas ramer !), parfois assez dur, bref, une valeur sure !

[u][b]Mediocre FPS[/b][/u]

+ acceptable follow-up of a total classic
+ the visuals are very impressive (considered how old the game is)
+ the gameplay poses real challenge
+ genuine physical model

- I've really enjoyed the setting in Orwellian dystopia, but the final experience could have been MUCH more comprehensive: the story was no big deal, the NPCs were rather superficial and the interconnection with the previous game seemed rather loose
- the AI is really bad (on one hand, companions like rebel warriors and antlions are completely useless - always blocking your path or getting themselves killed in the most stupid way; on the other hand, enemies always see you on infinite distance and some of them, like the striders, seem to have no front or rear, which spoils any attemps of playing Half-Life 2 in a stealthy way)
- unbalanced difficulty (sometimes the game is nearly frustratingly hard even when played on Easy: hitting gunships and striders with endless torrent of rockets - while you can carry only three at a time - is often tiresome)
- minor bugs (like game sometimes stucks for 10-30 seconds while saving)

NOTE: I've played this game nearly ten years after the initial release; it was like a rediscovery of something I should have known long ago. Perhaps this was the reason I disliked more features than an average user playing the game in the time it was brand new; also, due to very positive rating my expectations were extremely high.

Even after several years since its release HL2 still stands tall as an excellent FPS. Brilliant level design, still very quality graphics, intense and well paced gameplay and a kick ass story told from the perspective of Dr Freeman. I didnt realise how much fun I would have playing this through again. And am very excited to hear HL3 is in the pipeline. A real MUST own in anyone's steam library.
Just buy this already.

Dieses Game ist einfach nur beeindruckend. Es steckt so viel Arbeit dahinter. Die Grafik ist zwar nicht die beste (aus 2005), man merk aber, dass man sehr an die Details  gearbeitet hat. Die Story ist ebenfalls beeindruckend und ausreichend durchdacht.
Ich kann mir nicht vorstellen wie es wäre, wenn Half-Life 2 realität wäre....
